Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Marmelittin (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 69.2% similarity toBmkb1. molecular formula: C134H221N37O34; Mol Wt: 2907.454; GRAVY =0.26.Activity: Active against Gram+ and Gram- bacteria. Active against B. cereus CGMCC 1.1846 (LC 6.69 uM), B. megaterium CGMCC 1.0459 (lethal concentration LC 2.86 uM), B. subtilis CGMCC 1.2428 (LC 3.13 uM), M. luteus CGMCC 1.0290 (LC 1.85 uM), methicillin-sensitive S. aureus CGMCC 1.89 (MIC 4.87 uM), penicillin-sensitive S. epidermidi P1111 (MIC 4.24 uM), methicillin-resistant coagulase-negative S. aureus p1369 (MIC 3.01 uM), MRSA P1374 (LC 2.60 uM),  penicillin-resistant S. epidermidis P1389 (LC 2.35 uM), MRSA p1386 (LC 8.11 uM), PRSE P1389 (LC 3.12 uM), S. aureus J685 (LC 8.4 uM), S. aureus J698 (LC 6.24 uM), S. aureus J700 (LC 10.86 uM), S. aureus J706 (LC 8.41 uM), S. aureus J708 (LC 4.69 uM), S. aureus J710 (LC 8.41 uM), S. sanguinis ATCC 1.2497 (LC 4.7 uM),  S. salivarius ATCC 1.2498 (LC 4.7 uM),  S. mutans ATCC 1.2499 (LC 2.85 uM), S. warneri ATCC 1.2824 (LC 0.18 uM), S. griseus NBRC 13350 (LC 5.19 uM), and S. scabiei CGMCC 4.1765 (LC 1.56 uM).Structure: helical in 50% TFE.
Literature Information.Author: Gao B, Zhu S.2018
Literature Information.Title: Mesobuthus Venom-Derived Antimicrobial Peptides Possess Intrinsic Multifunctionality and Differential Potential as Drugs.
